about-me-message: Currently in my second year (BAC+2) of computer science, my goal is to strengthen my skills in this field. Starting from next year, I will focus on game development.
looking-for-message: I am looking for an internship in development, preferably in the video game industry, but I am open to other opportunities, with a duration of either 6 weeks or 12 weeks (part-time). Ideally, I would be available to start the internship towards the end of the school year, around May 20th.
projects-platformer: A platfomer game made with Unity. Goal is to pass each challenge that is presented until you reach the end.
projects-kingdom-panic: A game made with Unreal Engine. It's a tower defense where the goal is to place towers as to defend against the enemy.
projects-pacman: An attempt of the game Pacman using javascript.
projects-groupie-tracker: Use of the groupie-tracker API to create an app with golang.
projects-message: If you want to see all my projects, check out my
experience-1-title: Tower Defense Game in Unreal Engine
experience-1-content: I actively contributed to the development of a Tower Defense game using Blueprints. The project spanned seven months, involving regular bi-weekly team meetings to ensure project alignment. My role included effective remote project management, fostering optimal progress throughout the development process.
experience-2-content: During my internship with LesBaleries' association, I collaborated within a team to develop a WordPress website. Over the course of six weeks, I worked remotely, utilizing SQL for database management and executing necessary queries. Additionally, I adapted the code to accommodate various extensions used in the project.
contact-note: To note, the contact form will not send any message to my actual email address.
